house_listing.house_description: Absolutely lovely! A must see! Has spiral staircase ( could put elevator in!!) Large grt rm w/ gas fp & lovely mantel surround. Both bedrooms are spacious w/ good closets, nice kitchen! Unit is spacious, bright & airy! Better hurry! Nice deck & one car garage
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Club House,Contemporary Style, Foyer, Garage Door Opener, Microwave, OutsideSprinkler System, Utility Room
